Title: Police contacted over school rugby tour

Title: Churches have a long history of being safe havens — for immigrants and others
Description:
For centuries, houses of worship have served as havens for people needing refuge — and, in recent decades, sanctuary from the U.S.

Title: Trump wants Jordan and Egypt to accept more refugees to 'just clean out' Gaza
Description: President Donald Trump said Saturday he'd like to see Jordan, Egypt and other Arab nations increase the number of Palestinian refugees they are accepting to "just clean out" the war-torn area.

Title: Want good luck this year? Try these Lunar New Year traditions from NPR readers

Title: The tumultuous history of America's pioneering all-metal house, which neighbors wanted to tear down and architects fought to save
Description: The Aluminaire House, built as a prototype of what housing of the future could be, has been saved by enthusiasts many times over its 94-year history.

Title: Iraq is a key test of Trump's willingness to counter Iran
